resources.string:
This service is used for:


AppLocker

This service NEVER collects your data to hack you, etc.
It is used ONLY for the provided functions above.
Select the applications to apply protection to
This app will crash by dividing by 0
Set the password that will be used to unlock the selected apps
Set this app as the device administrator to prevent deletion and improve the security
Delete this app, remove Device Administrator
Are you sure that you want to delete this app? \nIf you have a problem, send a bug report to GitHub.\nIf you delete this app, the protection will stop working and all your settings will be deleted.

This feature requires the accessibility permission in order to work. The permission is needed for detecting when an app gets opened, and if it\'s in the list of selected apps, close it and show a fake crash dialog.\nThis permission is NEVER used for anything not listed here.\nYou will be taken back to the app after granting this permission.
Grant the notification permission to know when an update is available
The number of failed unlock attempts needed to trigger the security
The actions that will be taken when the security is triggered

This feature requires the device administrator permission in order to work.
It's used for the following:
- Detect failed unlock attempts and take the required actions
- Wipe your device if there was too many failed unlock attempts (configurable)
- Disable the camera on the lock screen to prevent abuse
This app NEVER uses this permissions for anything not listed here.
An alarm sound will be played at 100% volume, and any attempts to change it will be prevented
Take a photo without the intruder knowing
Lock this app with a PIN code.
Failed to launch the Files app. It may not exist on your device.
The new version is ready to be installed. Install?\nPlease note that you will need to grant the \"Install unknown apps\" permission to this app in order to continue.
Allow unlocking this app with a fingerprint or your face.
Don\'t show the contents of this app in the \"Recents\" menu to keep your privacy.
Enable the dynamic theme based on your wallpaper. Works only on Android 12 or higher.
An app with a lot of useful features for your device, such as security, customization and tools.
You have unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them?\nYou can press Back to cancel exiting.
Do you want to discard the changes?
This feature requires Android 8 or higher.
When the screen will be unlocked successfully, you will be notified if there were attempts to unlock your device without permission
A blank notification that is required for taking photos of intruders.\nTip: you can disable this notification on the lock screen so the intruder won\'t see this.
When a new version is available
When Intruder photo captures an intruder. Appears only after successfully unlocking the screen.
A foreground service that does nothing. It is not required, but recommended for stability of security features.

This permission is needed for the following features:
- Protect this app from being removed by an intruder
- Detect failed unlock attempts to take the required actions

This app NEVER uses this permission for anything not listed above.
View in Google Play (or other store)
View this app in Google Play or other stores if it exists
This app has recovered from an error and restarted automatically. \nYou can view the error and report it by pressing "Details".
What have you done before this error happened?\n\nYou can skip this if you want.
The app will check for updates in the background each 1 minute
Saves the settings into a \"dd.mm.yyyy_HH:MM.tiosettings.zip\" file. Passwords and device-specific settings are not saved

Import the settings from a \"dd.mm.yyyy_MM:SS.tiosettings.zip\" file. Warning: the previous settings are overwritten. This cannot be undone. The app will restart to prevent conflicts with the previous settings.
Enable accessibility to make App Locker work again
Re-enable accessibility to continue using App Locker
You\'ve used App Locker and the accessibility service suddenly stopped working. Enable accessibility to enable App Locker again.
Turn on at least one action
You\'ve turned on Unlock Protection, but didn\'t select any actions. Enable them to secure your device better!
Set a password for App Locker to better secure your apps
Select apps for App Locker to protect
No notifications. Have a good day!
You can always enable updates again through settings
The app has encountered a fatal error and shut down.
Lock this app using App Locker

This feature requires the notification access permission in order to work. This permission is needed to detect and save all notifications that are posted on your device.\nThis permission is NEVER used for anything not listed here.
Removes all duplicate notifications from the same app and with the same content
Remove useless notifications like \"12 new messages from 5 chats\"
Select the applications from which the notifications will be saved
This service keeps your screen on while the Sleep tile is disabled.
This service will take security actions when someone touches your phone.
Failed to share APK, please try again
If enabled, accelerometer and rotation sensors will be used to detect touches
Trigger security actions when the charger is connected/disconnected
Shortcuts aren\'t supported on your device.
